amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to the advanced nuclear energy licensing cost-share grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2104 proposed by Senator Crapo. (consideration: CR S1419; text: CR S1419) To modify provisions relating to the advanced nuclear energy licensing cost-share grant program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2104 proposed by Senator Crapo.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2104 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
